alert.note: Alert for Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 14 at 3:46AM MST until February 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph this afternoon increasing to 35 to 45 mph tonight with gusts 55 to 65 mph. * WHERE...Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista. * WHEN...Winds will initially increase by early afternoon with the windiest conditions overnight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and damage to carports, awnings, trees and power lines may occur.
info.instruction: Secure trash cans...lawn furniture...and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. High winds can topple trees...blow weakened roofs off outbuildings...and down power lines. Use extreme caution when driving.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
